channel.title: Client help
channel.description: got an issue with a client port forwarded correctly i check on cantseeme.org the no-ip is working but i changed the client around and give it to a friend and he cant connect i changed the client file to put my noip in it and he still cant connect any ideas?

item.title: Client help

got an issue with a client port forwarded correctly i check on cantseeme.org the no-ip is working but i changed the client around and give it to a friend and he cant connect i changed the client file to put my noip in it and he still cant connect any ideas?
